attributes.action: call a general election with immediate effect
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to call a general election with immediate effect.
The British people are not happy about the way the economy has been handled & how the banks have been bailed out with taxpayers money.
The Prime Minister's government has no electoral mandate.
A general election should have been called when Tony Blair resigned.
We the British people demand a general election immediately.
Thank you.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
